text: Mixed Flats is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Ben Walker - Jack Robbins * Oliver Hardy - Bob White * Frances Ne Moyer - Mrs. Robbins * Mabel Paige - Slavey * Nellie Farron - Mrs. Blake * Ed Lawrence - Minister Blake * William H. Hopkins - A Janitor ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:1915 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Mixed Flats
